name: ZoomMeetingSDK

license.type: Zoom API License and Terms of Use
license.text: Use of this SDK is subject to our [License and Terms of Use](https://explore.zoom.us/docs/en-us/zoom_api_license_and_tou.html);

description:
The Zoom Meeting SDK lets you display the familiar Zoom meeting and webinar experience in your app or website. The Meeting SDK interface resembles the Zoom client, except that it lives inside your own app or website.

To know more, see: https://developers.zoom.us/docs/meeting-sdk/
